items.content_html: This CRUD system project uses HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Bootstrap for a responsive interface, enabling create, read, update, and delete operations with LocalStorage for persistence. Icons enhance navigation and usability. It's ideal for developers needing a lightweight client-side solution.
items.title: Saeed-Youseef1/CRUD-System:  This CRUD system project uses HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Bootstrap for a responsive interface, enabling create, read, update, and delete operations with LocalStorage for persistence. Icons enhance navigation and usability. It's ideal for developers needing a lightweight client-side solution.

items.content_html: Performant and lightweight Node.js library to convert PDF file/buffer pages to PNG or JPEG files/buffers without binary and OS dependencies (except MacOs on arm64). Designed with high focus on performance and developer experience.

items.content_html: observerly's lightweight, zero-dependency, type safe astrometry library written in TypeScript. This library can be used to ascertain to positions of the Sun, Moon and the planets, as well as ascertain transit times for any astronomical object.
